document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 192''' was released in July of 2011 in online format only. It contains the following articles related to the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]'':
document_data.Backdrop: Daggerdale:
: ''By [[Eric Menge]], illustrated by [[Noah Bradley]], cartography by [[Jared Blando]].'' '''p. 60–66'''
This article describes the history of [[Daggerdale]]. {{Dusup|192/Backdrop: Daggerdale}}
document_data.Creature Incarnations: Abyssal Plague De:
: ''By [[Michael E. Shea]], illustrated by [[Kieran Yanner]].'' '''p. 52–56'''
This article documents the various [[demon]] creatures spawned by the [[Abyssal plague]]. {{Dusup|192/Creature Incarnations: Abyssal Plague Demons}}
document_data.[[Eye on the Realms]]: Masks of Living F:
: ''By [[Ed Greenwood]], illustrated by [[Jason Bennett]].'' '''p. 67–69'''
This article provides an overview of the strange parasitic creature called a [[jaod]]. {{Dusup|192/Eye on the Realms: Masks of Living Flesh}}
document_data.''Monster Manual'' Update: Gibbering Bea:
: ''By [[Logan Bonner]], illustrated by [[Thomas M. Baxa]] and [[Pete Venters]].'' '''p. 76–78'''
Updates and lore for the [[gibbering beast]]s. {{Dusup|192/Monster Manual Update: Gibbering Beast}}
document_data.''Monster Manual'' Update: Chuul:
: ''By [[Logan Bonner]], illustrated by [[Wayne Reynolds]] and [[Francis Tsai]].'' '''p. 79–80'''
Updates and lore for the [[chuul]]. {{Dusup|192/Monster Manual Update: Chuul}}
document_data.''Monster Manual'' Update: Grell:
: ''By [[Logan Bonner]], illustrated by [[Alexey Aparin]] and [[Francis Tsai]].'' '''p. 81–83'''
Updates and lore for the [[grell]]. {{Dusup|192/Monster Manual Update: Grell}}
